snippet: At a rally, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo endorsed Adrienne Esposito, who was not even given a speaking slot; some liberals suspect the governor does not truly want a Democratic Senate.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew C Cuomo endorses Democrat Adrienne Esposito of Suffolk County for State Senate; some liberals suspect Cuomo does not truly want a Democratic Senate.
lead_paragraph: At a rally, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo endorsed Adrienne Esposito, who was not even given a speaking slot; some liberals suspect the governor does not truly want a Democratic Senate.

headline.main: Cuomo Endorses Democrat for State Senate
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Tepidly Endorses a Democrat for State Senate
